dict.string: -All riders aboard tours that consume alcohol must be 21 years of age or older -Alcohol must only be consumed by those on the tour. It must not be given to anyone else not the street, etc. -Inappropriate behavior will result in the driver asking asking the renter to ask the offending passenger(s) to immediately disembark -The drivers decisions are final

Inappropriate behavior (as determined by the driver) before, during or after tours includes, but is not limited to:
-intoxication -littering -providing alcohol to non-passengers -excessive noise -public urination -loitering more than 5 minutes after tour -any forms of public nudity -Physically endangering themselves by acting careless on the bike (i.e.e jumping off the bike moving, refusal to stay seated, hanging out into traffic etc.).
Severe transgressions of the above will result in the driver ending the tour immediately and result in a fee of $XXX.XX (adjustable in settings of app by user) to be charges to renters credit cards.

I understand that operating and.or traveling on the <BusinessName> and participating in tours is a potentially dangerous activity.
